video_prompt: Camera slowly rotates around a crouching woman. Her white pigtails sway, silver jewelry subtly glints and chains softly jingle. Her golden skirt and red sash ripple and trail on the white floor as she shifts. Transparent, swirling liquid shapes emerge and dissipate around her. Her gaze intensifies as the camera moves.
image_prompt: Anime illustration of a white-haired, red-eyed woman in traditional silver and gold attire, kneeling against a white background. She has large pigtails with intricate silver jewelry and red accents. She wears a dark top, elaborate silver necklace, and a red circular arm symbol with reddish forearm markings, plus silver bangles and golden fabric with a red sash. Transparent, swirling water/bubble-like shapes surround her. Subtle, powerful presence.
refined_video_prompt: The camera slowly rotates. White pigtails sway, silver jewelry glints, and chains subtly jingle. Her golden skirt and red sash ripple and trail as she subtly shifts. Transparent, swirling liquid forms emerge and dissipate around her. Her gaze intensifies throughout the movement.
